channel.title: Golang on Ten thousand words...
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Ten thousand words...

item.title: What I'm up to
item.description: I have been a bit quiet, mostly due to the holidays and general busyness. While I don’t have anything ready to go, there are some fun things coming down the line: 1. I have been converting the CA-Rice physiological model to Go. Why this model? I reached out to Bard Miller, and he was kind enough to send the source code. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the code was simple, well-organized, and generally easy to make sense of.
